DOC.brief_summary: The intervention program `` Obeldicks light '' develop overweight child age 8-16 year . This intervention gender - age specific . The 6-month intervention base nutrition course , behaviour therapy exercise therapy . The evaluation compromise quality structure , process result intervention . 300 participant randomise control group design evaluate 4 time point : baseline , end intervention , 6 month end intervention 12 month end intervention.Primary outcome measure change weight status standard deviation score BMI . Drop-outs interview improve intervention .
